risk_assessment.title: Risk Assessment
risk_assessment.description: Answer these questions so we can determine your risk profile and recommend the most suitable asset allocation.
risk_assessment.info_message: Your risk profile will help us recommend an asset allocation that's more suitable for your investment goals.

risk_assessment.time_horizon: What is your investment time horizon?
risk_assessment.market_decline: If your investments lost 20% of their value in 3 months, what would you do?
risk_assessment.investment_knowledge: How would you describe your level of investment knowledge?
risk_assessment.income_stability: How would you rate the stability of your income?
risk_assessment.financial_goals: What is your main financial goal with this investment?

market_decline.sell_all: Sell everything to avoid further losses
market_decline.do_nothing: Do nothing and wait for recovery
market_decline.buy_some_more: Buy a little more to take advantage of low prices
market_decline.buy_significantly_more: Buy much more to take advantage of the opportunity

investment_knowledge.none: None - I'm a beginner at investing
investment_knowledge.extensive: Extensive - I have experience investing regularly
investment_knowledge.professional: Professional - I work or have worked in finance

income_stability.very_unstable: Very unstable - Varies significantly month to month
income_stability.somewhat_unstable: Somewhat unstable - May vary from month to month
income_stability.average: Average - Generally stable with some variations
income_stability.very_stable: Very stable - Completely secured income long-term

financial_goals.preserve_capital: Preserve capital - Minimize risks at all costs
financial_goals.income_generation: Generate income - Obtain regular dividends or yields
financial_goals.balanced_growth: Balanced growth - Balance between safety and returns
financial_goals.growth: Growth - Focus on long-term capital appreciation
financial_goals.aggressive_growth: Aggressive growth - Maximize returns by taking high risks

risk_assessment.time_horizon: Your time horizon directly affects the investment strategy. With more time, you can take more risk.
risk_assessment.market_decline: Your reaction to market downturns indicates your real risk tolerance.
risk_assessment.investment_knowledge: Greater knowledge means better ability to evaluate and manage risky investments.
risk_assessment.income_stability: Your income stability determines your ability to maintain investments during volatile periods.
risk_assessment.financial_goals: Different goals require different strategies and risk levels.

conservative.title: Conservative Profile
conservative.description: You prefer safety and stability in your investments, even if this means more modest returns.

moderate.title: Moderate Profile
moderate.description: You seek a balance between safety and growth, with controlled risk.

balanced.title: Balanced Profile
balanced.description: You are comfortable with a medium level of risk in search of above-average returns.

growth.title: Growth Profile
growth.description: You are willing to accept greater volatility in exchange for higher growth potential.

aggressive.title: Aggressive Profile
aggressive.description: You seek to maximize returns and are willing to take significant risks to achieve them.
